resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.school: The University of Texas at Austin
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Coursework: Algorithms, Cloud Computing, Computer Architecture, Computer Networks, Data Structures, Modern Web Applications, Operating Systems, Software Engineering

work.title: Anica Inc.
work.description: Built a property management website that allows landlords and real estate professionals to track leases, residents, and maintenance tasks as well as collect rent and manage finances to reduce costs and streamline operations.

work.title: Well Connect MDs
work.description: Developed an Android application that improves the efficiency of conducting chronic care management services. The application allows doctors to capture patient information, schedule appointments, and automate billing.

projects.title: Trading Cards
projects.category: A web application for Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Cards

projects.title: Food Me Once
projects.category: Website designed to look into the issue of food security in the United States

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
